      参数类型为BattleField的com.Leo.Game中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Timer.Continue(BattleField battleField)
      Timer continues to count method Calculate the total duration of the pause pauseCount += (System.currentTimeMillis() - pauseStart) and stop the pause thread.stopped = false.
      void Timer.Reset(BattleField battleField)
      Reset timer method Set the timer to start the pause time to the program start time pauseStart = programStart; pause the total time to reset to zero pauseCount = 0 ; the pause time state is false thread.stopped = false; and the time stamp is 0 label.setText(INITIAL_LABEL_TEXT);
      void Timer.Stop(BattleField battleField)
      Pause timing method The timer records the start time pauseStart = System.current<TimeMillis() and sets the stop boolean to true thread.stopped = true.

      构造器和说明

      Mage fireball construction method with five parameters The position and definition of the fireball is the enemy fireball or our fireball.
